title: Grass Length
question_text: In a given neighborhood, residentsâ€™ grass has a mean of $3.4\text{ inches}$ with a standard deviation of $1.4\text{ inches}$ , and is normally distributed. Assuming the lawns are randomly selected, find the probability of coming across $5\text{ lawns}$ that average more than $5\text{ inches}$ long in this neighborhood.
